replies.body: Thanks for the link, helps a great deal! She is definitely a champ that I see worthy of making an investment in. Hopefully her clear times haven't gotten too tarnished by the dominance of the season 5 jungle monsters early.
Crack those safes! Good luck on your Evelynn adventures. I like her as a champ but I can't play her well at all.

She does have a unique playstyle. The melee squishy. She is very rewarding once you learn her though. This is where I like to look if I'm struggling to build a champ:
http://www.op.gg/ranking/champions/name=evelynn
